typeSystemDescription.name: Baleen Type System - Common
typeSystemDescription.description:
XML definition of the Baleen type system common named entities.
This XML file classified as UK OFFICIAL.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.common.Frequency
typeDescription.description: A specific frequency value in the electro-magnetic spectrum (Hertz - Hz, MHz, GHz etc.).

featureDescription.name: vehicleIdentifier
featureDescription.description: An identifying name or number for the vehicle

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.common.Person
typeDescription.description: A Person named entitiy, as defined by an explict name reference within the source document.

featureDescription.name: title
featureDescription.description: A person's title, for example Mr or President

featureDescription.name: gender
featureDescription.description:
Should be one of the following: * MALE * FEMALE * UNKNOWN
If empty or null, it is assumed to be UNKNOWN.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.common.Organisation
typeDescription.description: An explicit refrence to a formal organisation, including governmental, political, religious, charitable, economic/financial, business or criminal bodies.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.common.Url
typeDescription.description: A well-formed uniform resource location (URL) value

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.common.Buzzword
typeDescription.description: User-defined key phrases or domain-specific terms, described by a type property.

featureDescription.name: tags
featureDescription.description: A list of types that are associated with a given BuzzWord value.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.common.Money
typeDescription.description: Specific amount of some current mentioned within the document.

featureDescription.name: amount
featureDescription.description: Numeric value of amount of money mentioned in document.

featureDescription.name: currency
featureDescription.description: String value of the currency denomination the money amount is specified in.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.common.Quantity
typeDescription.description: Type to annotate references to quantities within text

featureDescription.name: normalizedUnit
featureDescription.description: The unit of the normalized quantity

featureDescription.name: unit
featureDescription.description: The unit of the raw quantity

featureDescription.name: countryCode
featureDescription.description: The country code associated with this nationality, e.g. FRA for French

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.common.CommsIdentifier
typeDescription.description: A communication identifier - including equipent, user, accounts or subscription. Includes (but not limited to) the following types: emailAddress, IPv4, IPv6, MSISDN, IMEI, IMSI values.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.common.DocumentReference
typeDescription.description: A publication reference/serial/identifier within the source document.
